Missing Marokopa family: Police have ‘ready access’ to New Zealand Defence Force if needed during search - commissioner https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/missing-marokopa-family-police-have-ready-access-to-new-zealand-defence-force-if-needed-during-search-commissioner/ QHJDQW3UPFDYZNXDGM5YEFCXZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/missing-marokopa-family-police-have-ready-access-to-new-zealand-defence-force-if-needed-during-search-commissioner/ QHJDQW3UPFDYZNXDGM5YEFCXZ4/ Julia Gabel'I can assure you that support has been called on through the course of this operation.' Sat, 19 Oct 2024 23:31:55 +0000 Police are searching for Tom Phillips and his three children Ember, Maverick, and Jayda, who have been missing from Marokopa since December 2021.
